website_summaries.verdict: Exceedingly popular among customers, this inexpensive wetsuit impresses with its functionality and durability.
pros: Flexible suit, especially in arms and underarms
The extra-long zipper leash makes it easy to pull the suit on and off
cons: Difficult to find the correct size
Material has a manufactured smell upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first wetsuit I have ever owned and fits like I would expect it to. 5'6" 34" waistband 195 lbs after donuts I went by the sizing chart and read the reviews. It said large on the chart and XL by the reviews. I went on with XL and fit just right. It is a little snug in the crotch area but having irish genetics It fit fine. low 60 degree water temps and it worked great at making that very tolerable for swimming. Delivered on time as promised and product is wonderful so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jasonnabors

customer_reviews.title: Camel Toez
customer_reviews.text: One size too small? I used the size chart. I'm 5'8", 165 pounds and 32" waist which are on the short end, mid weight and smaller waist of the Large on the men's size chart. Too tight in the crotch. No photos! I'm just saying that's an unusual look especially for a man. I've never ordered an extra large for me before but I just ordered this in an XL.
customer_reviews.author: A1

customer_reviews.title: Order way larger than you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6"1", 242lbs. We ordered a 4XL and it fits perfectly. (He is normally an XL)
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light weight shorty for a trip to the Caymans but didn’t want to spend too much for a one week trip. The suit arrived and I was very surprised at the weight and quality of the product. It was just the right weight for late spring water temp in the Caymans. Just be aware that you need to order up at least one size as they apparently run small. I’m 5’10 and weigh 165 and I needed an extra large. Normally I’d think about a medium but probably try a large. After reading several comments regarding size u ordered an extra large and was glad u did. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Nice water suit
customer_reviews.text: Update, I tested this suit today on Snake R in Jackson WY. I did an 8 m. whitewater trip with Barker Ewing, included class 2 & 3 Rapids, this suit kept me warm in 45 degree water. Love it. I had to return my first order as too small. I suggest that you use the sizing chart and then order one size larger, for men. Suit seems well made and zipper in the back doesn't bother me. To put suit on -turn it completely inside out then put your legs in first and pull the suit up over arms. Then pull up zipper using the long leash.
customer_reviews.author: The handsome cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Suite
customer_reviews.text: This suite is really good quality. I’m 5’10” 200lbs w big butt and 42DD and it fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wetsuit for a sea kayaking trip on Lake Superior. After reading all the reviews, I went a size larger than I normally wear, as several people had said they run a little small. The one I ordered fit perfectly, was very comfortable throughout several long days, and really kept my core warm. I am very pleased with the performance so far; I have only used it for about 2 months, so can't speak to durability, but it is holding up well under normal to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Meredyth Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for snorkeling. Originally ordered a 9, which fit everywhere tightly (as it should) except too tight on my neck. The 11 was probably not tight enough if the water was freezing, but it was perfect for what I wanted. I was able to tighten the arms, and my legs aren't thin so it was perfect. Very flexible and comfortable. Size chart is probably correct, I'm probably just built different. I'm 5'7" 142 pounds, but not large boned. And, I do have a short neck, haha. The slightly bigger size made it easier to get on and off, definitely a plus on the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect. It kept me warm
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. It kept me warm. I got a size 5 in the wetsuit. Fit like a glove. I'm 120 pounds, 5ft, 32C/34B bra size, I wear a size 2 in pants. Make sure you look at the sizing chart. The neck is a little snug but really wasn't an issue. Was able to move with ease and it was comfortable. Also delivered on time. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Must size off their charts.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wetsuit. You must buy off their chart NOT normal clothing size. Ordered for my husband who wears a 38 waist pant, 230 lbs (all belly but muscular arms/legs) who normally wears an XL in clothing but I ordered the 4XL and it is the perfect fit. It has nice touches like the adjustable arms with velcro. Very happy with price and sizing.
customer_reviews.author: fromMI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit! I am a female 5'9" that weighs ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit! I am a female 5'9" that weighs 204 pounds. My bust is 40DD and my hips measure 46". I ordered a Women's 15 and it fits fantastic! I haven't been in the water yet, so I will update my review once I have tried it out! It seems like it would be a good thickness for a variety of conditions including the 68 degree water I will be using it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is good, well built suit, & keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.text: 5' 3", 150 pounds. Size 9 works well. After reading reviews about many wetsuits, I mentally prepared for difficulty getting this on/off, and it's not as bad as I thought. I only need help zipping it up. Love the long zipper in back. IF zipper were in front, then I wouldn't need help at all. I have a cold water aversion, which most people don't understand, so the wetsuit helps me to swim in the pool with my kids without taking 30 minutes to get into the pool, LOL. Once in the pool, it only takes a minute for the water to warm up inside the wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Dymar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wet suit
customer_reviews.text: I use this wet suit to go bodyboarding at the beach and it fits well and is made of great quality. I’ve used it several times and it’s quite durable and fits and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: MerrY RevieWer

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful, well-made and were a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for me and one for my daughter. They are wonderful, well-made and were a perfect fit. I went to the Seavenger website and used the size guide there. They kept us warm in the alpine lake and were very buoyant. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a really nice wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chance to use it yet but I did try it on. It fits perfectly, and appears to be nice quality. I did as someone else suggested and went to the actual company website to find the women's sizes and measurements. I plan to use it paddle boarding and swimming at Lake Tahoe before the water warms up. I know, the water never warms up at Lake Tahoe! It actually does in August if you're really close to shore.
customer_reviews.author: dendan

customer_reviews.title: Best Size for Petite Women
customer_reviews.text: My wife is 5'1", 100 lbs, 36" hips, so we ordered a Women's 7 to make sure it fit over the hips. The legs went to the knees, the sleeves to the elbows, and there was a huge bulge in the chest and back. She often has luck with men's sizes, so we tried a Men's XS instead. Fits perfectly! She hates cold, so we went boogie boarding with a water temperature of 65, air temp 68, and 10 mph north wind. She felt warm the entire time, even walking back! This suit will extend our swimming time in early summer and early fall. Great investment, and great customer service when it comes to returns.
customer_reviews.author: David Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 16/18 in torrid sizes and my hips are 50”. I wasn’t sure what size to buy and went with the men’s 4xl. It’s a little big on top but not too big that it doesn’t help keep me warm. It’s also easier to put on then I thought and the zipper is easy pull on and take off. The suit is great quality for the price and worked really well for snorkeling in SoCal in spring.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: I surf religiously rain or shine in Southern California and this winter was the first winter I felt I needed a suit but I refuse to wear a thick full suit because I over heat easily in them. This shorty was beyond perfect. I wore it in 53 degree water temps and it was legit comfortable. Way easy mobility and keeps you warm enough that you don't get hypothermia but not to warm where its uncomfortable. And it was only like 45 bucks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great fit nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, I'm tall 5'10" and this fits great. The zipper could be a little longer to fit over the hips but it works ok. Love the thickness for that cold mountain lake! Highly recommended!!!! Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AlleyCat

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is too short
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit fits great but I do have one complaint, the zipper. The zipper only goes down to just above the smallest point of the suit. Since I’m more curvy and have larger hips this makes getting it over my hips a lot harder than it needed to be. If you have a straighter figure or are a guy this won’t be an issue, but you may find the suit oddly shaped for you. The suit has quite a bit of curve in it to accommodate a curvy figure, so it’s kind of a mismatch in its design. It really just needs a zipper that’s about 6 inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: Preferred Electric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Caribbean diving
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Caribbean diving. Can't argue with the price. I am 5' 6", with an 34 in waist. I weight around 165 Lbs. I admit I have a bit of a belly for a short guy. The Large size was a good fit. I bought both Medium and Large, as there was no way to know for sure. Medium was a bit tight. Went on multiple dives all week. No issues. It kept me nice and warm in the cool Feb. Caribbean ocean while scuba diving.
customer_reviews.author: Kwang C

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect! I was surprised of the thickness of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3'' 225 lbs with a 37'' waist and based on the chart it said I needed a 3XL. No way!! First time buyer for a wet suit so I thought they must know what they are doing. Ordered it on Sunday evening, received it Tuesday (a day early). Fit is perfect! I was surprised of the thickness of the suit. 3mm will be plenty thick for a Nov/Dec swim in Lake Mead, AZ. I have already given this info to my wife, daughter and son to order.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Hecksel

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok but way too small
customer_reviews.text: I️ am 5’ 9” and weigh 175. I️ could not begin to fit into the large. So, I️ will keep for my son. I️ ended up buying a different product. This product really needs an accurate sizing chart
customer_reviews.author: JGravely

customer_reviews.title: Great shorty wet suit!
customer_reviews.text: Shorty wetsuit arrived as advertised. I’m 5’7” and 125 lbs, And women’s size 7 fits perfectly. I sized up based on other reviews. I have used it to water ski a couple times, and it’s awesome. Keeps me warm, but not too warm.
customer_reviews.author: JMat

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is off and shoulders are too tight on me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a womens 11 in black/grey I'm 5ft 10" tall and around 150lbs with an athletic build. The Women's 11 fit me well in the top half but the crotch had around 2 inches of extra loose fabric. I also found the shoulders too tight and restrictive. The suit looks awesome and is super lightweight, plus easy to put on, but I'm returning this suit due to it not fitting me correctly. It also shipped in 3 days
customer_reviews.author: Proppashoppa

customer_reviews.title: Read the size chart
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the size chart and it said XXL, I wear large in most things so I went XL, it's pretty snug. I'm sure an XXL would have been fine. This has got me comfortably through 4 of my scuba certification classes in a surprisingly cold pool and 3 days of diving in the Caribbean. There's a little wear on the seams where the BCD straps ride but overall impressed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Perez

customer_reviews.title: neat wetsuit for cooler waters
customer_reviews.text: using the fitting chart I thought that it would be loose on me but is a little tight, maybe it will stretch a bit with use but the material is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: rusl21

customer_reviews.title: Glad I had it in Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: On a boat trip, only our small group with wetsuits stayed in the water the whole time during a snorkeling stop. It really made the water pleasant to just hang out in. It was impossible to dive, but the comfort was worth it. The suit itself was perfect for a vacation trip. (X-large => 6'0, 180)
customer_reviews.author: Troy in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 10" and 220 pounds and just lost 120 lbs so I have some loose skin. I wear a XXL scuba pro suit that fits. This isn't even close. I am keeping it in hopes that it will fit when I reach my goal of 200. I hope I don't have to sell it on eBay. I have ordered a 4XL for diving til then
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wolchick

customer_reviews.title: Very good suit; especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Have used the suit for two week long dive trips in the Caribbean and will be using again in June for another week long. The suit is a good fit for me, it is easy on and off; the 3 mm has kept me comfortable in Caribbean waters.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Adam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, except for a few seam spots on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear in Chicago triathlon. Comfortable, except for a few seam spots on the back which chafed--but not badly. The pro athletes wear much more expensive suits--ten times the price--with a smoother finish, but this was fine for a first timer like me. I will use again for snorkeling and late/early season lake swimming.
customer_reviews.author: SueBoo

customer_reviews.title: decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for upcoming trip to Galapagos. I was looking for something lower cost, but with decent reviews, since I may never use it again after this trip (preferred to have my own rather than rent). I typically wear a medium, but ordered a large based on other reviews. The large seems a bit tight, but is fine. I have not snorkeled with it yet, so maybe it will loosen up a bit when wet. As long as it does not shrink, this will do well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Fit just right! Used it to scuba dive in Barbados. Will purchase full length version. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mombo_Moe

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: This 2xl is barely bigger than my old XL from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Overall the fit was fine, but the product was too tight around my ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wear a large, this time I ordered an xlarge of this item. Overall the fit was fine, but the product was too tight around my neck. I had difficulty breathing while wearing it snorkeling. I had to take it off to continue with the outing. Unfortunately, it was too late (after the 30 days) for me to return it. Be careful with sizing when you purchase it. I was happy with how it was made and would order from them again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall, just be careful with sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10 and 195 with a 32" waist. I usually wear a L shirt size but the width of my arms and legs are above average as I lift weights. I ordered a XXL and it fits very well. A little baggy in the midsection but perfect around the arms and legs. Seems to be good quality and good thickness
customer_reviews.author: Ben Grisel

customer_reviews.title: Size 5xl fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I preferred two sizes large and it fits perfectly. I'm 6'2"and 315lbs. Size 5xl fits great.
customer_reviews.author: WZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I’m naturally cold in the water, so this has been great. I have used it while snorkeling several times and I am glad I had it. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Indoorplant

customer_reviews.title: Warm and not restrictive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to excersise in our cold pool. Keeps me warm enough but not too reatrictive. Fits true to size. It's a little long in the torso and I'm a little long already in the torso, but it's not a deal breaker. Bought size 11 women's and I'm 170lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, just go by waist size.
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is very good for pool use or warm water scuba dives or snorkeling . When using the size chart it is most helpful to go by waist size as the suits run large on the other measurements. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Gerstner

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product one size up based upon reviews, and it fits perfectly. It is comfortable and figure flattering. I use it in Lake Superior during the summer months. The water temp is usually between 52F-62F. For fall weather, I would get a full length thicker wet suit, but for the summer temps, this suit makes it possible for me to be in the water for 10-15 minute periods of time while kayaking and snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Cashin

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Just follow their fitment chart. Very well made and have a nice design to them. Hawaii tested!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shred

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who gets cold easily. Fits great and keeps her warm. It worked so well i bought two more for older daughter and wife
customer_reviews.author: Shamo

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: I have orered 2, for me and my girlfriend. I am 6'4" but skinny and ordred Large size. It s tight but I think this is how it should fit. Maybe better to go with XL. My girlfriend is 5'4" skinny, and we ordered smallest size 5 which was pretty big for her so re returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Love love this great suit. Fits great (I got an 11 as I'm a 10/12). My boyfriend got one, and his kids, and his brother-in-law and everyone has loved their suits.
customer_reviews.author: Lilwahine

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, but it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be small, because I'm obese. I was actually surprised when it fit as well as it did. It kept me warm, and is able to be in the ocean a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennylynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warm water trip suit.
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! I've got a gut, and I've had trouble finding a regular suit the fits in the waist without being too long in the legs. So this shorty is perfect for me. I took it on two trips to the Caribbean in 2017 and it was great on both trips.
customer_reviews.author: Randy M

customer_reviews.title: Great shorty suit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suit. It isn't too heavy and provides good protection while diving. I went diving 4 times on a recent trip to the Keys and the suit held up like a champ. I'm looking forward to many more dives with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and it keeps fish away from my skin for the most part. eww fish.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Keeping out cold so far needed help with zipper haven't gotten use to leash
customer_reviews.author: P Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit. Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for our vacation to the Southern Caribbean. She loved it. Scuba’d And Snuba’d in comfort. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Maccs

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit. I only use it in my pool 3 hours a day. It keeps me warm while I teach my students how to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Andres sierra

customer_reviews.title: The wet suit ran slightly small. I wear a ...
customer_reviews.text: The wet suit ran slightly small. I wear a medium/large and ordered a large size. It was too tight. I ordered an XL and it fit well. I just came back from vacation and the larger size wet suit fit perfectly. I am 175 lbs and 5'10".
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit with a belly pocket
customer_reviews.text: Both my true size (9) and one size smaller (7) have quite a bit of extra fabric in the belly area. I am 5'7" and 155 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: notsunami

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suits for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: Great shorty wet suit, especially for a 3mm at this price. My husband and I used our Seavenger wet suits for snorkeling in the Galapagos. They were comfortable, flexible, and kept us warm in the surprisingly cool water!
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Although this suit is a quality made suit it simply ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this suit is a quality made suit it simply doesn't do the job. I bought one for myself and one for my lady. Both suits fit perfectly according to size chart but both suits let in a significant amount of water from the leg section. The mens suit was EXTREMELY restricted in the groin area.
customer_reviews.author: v.k.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as agreed
customer_reviews.text: Bought to go scubadiving. Fits perfect for my body. Got a medium for my 5’7 150 # average size. Good quality. Will be wearing for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I’m 6 ft 220 lbs. ordered XXL. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Super flattering
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied it’s comfortable to wear it kept me warm in my California beaches. And it made me feel cute love it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but sizing is a gamble!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but these run way small. If you wear 2XL shirts, you will need this suit in 5 or 6XL!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Valerio

customer_reviews.title: Ordered size based on careful measurements and size chart provided ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size based on careful measurements and size chart provided. Suit arrived and was way too small. I returned, and reordered the next size up. The new one fits snug, as a wetsuit should!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Must have for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: These are must-haves for snorkeling, especially if you are heading out in cooler temps. Works great - sizing worked well for me also although I decided to get one size larger for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: KMaster

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is very well made and definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: FLMomOfTwinBoys

customer_reviews.title: Fit is very very small abd way way off
customer_reviews.text: I wear a large shirt. 44 shoulders, suit coat 44. Could not fit!!! I am not fat. I actually have a tapered body 34 waist. No way on earth could i fit in large or xl large. Had to go to dive shop in town.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES CAFFREY

customer_reviews.title: A nice suit at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I did order two sizes larger but the suit was very comfort, seems well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dennehy

customer_reviews.title: Good suit for short swims.
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfortable and fairly easy to put on. Kept me warm in chilly NorCal coast water. I wear medium clothing as a rule, but in this case, the XL fit well.
customer_reviews.author: George C

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit. I use it to Jetski when it’s too warm for my long suit. Comfortable and great fit
customer_reviews.author: Damir009

customer_reviews.title: It’s not 3mm thick more like 2mm. I think OK for temps 65 and ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not 3mm thick more like 2mm. I think OK for temps 65 and above, not so great below that.
customer_reviews.author: Watchdog

customer_reviews.title: I was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It fits great and is pretty easy to get on and off. I work out in a pool in Maryland that has a dome on it in the winter time. The water is quite chilly because the swimmers like it cold. I love this wetsuit it is perfect for the cold pool water.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Nice wetsuit. I’m a big man, and this works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Matt daniel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit well at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit and was uncomfortable so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Scheidt

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Nice suit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister-in-law. It fit her perfectly. She ended up not using it, but it looked great on her :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roche

customer_reviews.title: Great value wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for scuba diving in warm water. Well made shorty. Stitching is much more robust than other wetsuits at this price point. I am 6’1 and 200lbs (44” chest)and the 3XL fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ArmyMoose1997

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut off the neck trim because it pulled on the skin other than that excellent for cold pool
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The Suit.
customer_reviews.text: In use this suit in a lake in NEPA. Makes the swim season much longer and enjoyable. Highly recommended, ok would buy on the larger size....it losses up asnyounjse it more....very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Man

customer_reviews.title: good fit and value
customer_reviews.text: Size xl for 195lbs 6ft 2 in seemed small at first but turned out fine. Zipper stuck first time getting out at the beach, but got a buddy to help without damaging suit. Will wax the zipper and hope the suit doesn't keep getting bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: A really nice suit. Quality work and sharp looking. I used the size chart and measured 3 times, but it is way too small
customer_reviews.author: leah maloi

customer_reviews.title: Great suit. I don't use it when doing 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great suit. I don't use it when doing 2 or 3 dives but 1 maybe 2 this is great in warm water locations.
customer_reviews.author: Rick George

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm and helped me float
customer_reviews.text: Small fit me well and is TTS. For ref, 115lb 5 foot 4. We hit hanauma bay the snorkel at 6 am and it kept me warm. I was surprised how bouyant I was as well. Now I'm going to buy one for my teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryeli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Finally got to dive with it. Only small weight adjustment (1 lbs) only thing I don’t like is the rubber pulls my leg hair at the seam on the edge but it is a wetsuit so that’s a given.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Best product with reasonable price! I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.text: Best product with reasonable price! I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris, Buford, GA

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: Fit as ordered. I'm fat. And small great fit. 5'9. 225lbs. All belly. Got 3x. Sweet
customer_reviews.author: thomas lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit!! Well made and great quality for the cost, I'm getting another one for my spouse! Swam until water was 65 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Braseth

customer_reviews.title: ... he has made several comments on how much he like the fitting around the neck and arms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit for my husband for diving trip and he has made several comments on how much he like the fitting around the neck and arms. Based on the other reviews, I ordered an XL instead of a large and we are both very pleased. Great warm weather diving suit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the low price confuse you.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product!! Don't let the low price confuse you.
customer_reviews.author: MultiMind

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: I own a full wet suit a size smaller that fits better.
customer_reviews.author: sandy lee

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: It fit well, I expected it to be to large.
customer_reviews.author: Publicover

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, have used if every week during my classes and am very pleased with the quality and warmth this suit offers. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strange sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small on top, way too small on the bottom. Not sure who this was sized for.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little tight to get into but hey, it’s a wetsuit. They should be a little tight
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Maitland

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable...keeps me warm in the river and lake waters. Used it last spring and plan on using it again!
customer_reviews.author: John M Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: Got an extra large and should have gotten a large. Little too baggy in the crotch area. 175lbs 5'9
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and it works great. Inexpensive but seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: RAV

customer_reviews.title: but the quality seems very good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a shorty and a full length site. The fit is maybe a bit smaller than expected, but the quality seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the wetsuit yet but the quality seems incredibly good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Stanhope

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit for the money. Used it for a week down in Florida where the water was low 70s and felt good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit just as expected and kept me warm whIle sailing.
customer_reviews.author: tickgirl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm in the pool, fits great and I get lots of compliments. Planning on purchasing another to have one always dry. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Milagros

customer_reviews.title: Just needed it for one time and it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price. Just needed it for one time and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It helps to stay a little bit longer using the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Blueclaw65

product_meta.title: Seavenger Navigator 3mm Neoprene Shorty Wetsuit
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY — Nylon II neoprene material forms to your body like a second skin.
ULTRA FLEXIBLE — Super-stretch armpit panels make for easy mobility.
PREVENTS CHAFING — Flat-lock stitching prevents skin irritation.
LASTING DURABILITY — Anti-abrasion shoulder pads withstand wear from straps and other equipment.
EASY DONNING AND DOFFING — Extra long leash and a #10 YKK zipper for comfort and convenience.
